name: 計算機概論
description: 本課程著重計算機科學的基礎技術及知識，同時亦著重C相關程式設計的技巧，期讓同學有足夠的能力修習進階計算機相關課程，在往後諸多理論及應用課程上研習有所助益，並具備將來所預從事研究工作或深造之基本程式撰寫能力。
goals: 教導學生計算機科學的基礎技術及知識
訓練學生基本C相關程式設計的技巧，建立將來進入職場的基礎
syllabus:
本課程著重計算機科學的基礎技術及知識，同時亦著重C相關程式設計的技巧，期讓同學有足夠的能力修習進階計算機相關課程，在往後諸多理論及應用課程上研習有所助益，並具備將來所預從事研究工作或深造之基本程式撰寫能力。

Week 1

Course Introduction

Week 2

History of Computer and Computer Architecture

Week 3

Computer Architecture (CPU,  Main Memory,  Input/Output, Subsystem Interconnection)

Week 4

Number Representation (The transformation between binary, Decimal, and Hexadecimal) Operations on Bits (Ones' complement, 2's complement, floating-point number)

Week 5

Operation Systems (Process Manager, Memory Manager, Device Manager, and File Manager)

Week 6

Computer Networks (OSI Model, Categories of Networks (LAN, MAN, and WAN), Connecting Devices) Chap 4-5

Week 7

Internet (data link layer, Network layer, Transport layer, Application layer) Chap 5-6

Week 8

The World Wide Web (URL and WWW)

Week 9

 Cyber security

Week 10

Midterm exams/ Midterm presentation

Week 11

Input and Output (printf and  scanf),  IF statement

Week 12

Control structure I

Week 13

Control structure II

Week 14

Functions I

Week 15

Functions II

Week 16

Final exams

Week 17 & Week 18  自主學習範圍 Arrays
